thing we wanted to do was really tie them into the Emory administrative ecosystem and not make that feel like a
burden so instead of them having to use a procurement card we wanted to directly integrate to our financial accounting
system so they could use the the account codes on their grants to pay for these

accommodated the requirements for doing working with sensitive data when we set
